Title: The Apothecary (No. 59)
Writer: Jon Bokenkamp (created by), Marisa Tam (teleplay by), Brian Studler (story by)
Actors: James Spader, Megan Boone, Diego Klattenhoff, Amir Arison
Plot: Red has to figure out who betrayed him when he's poisoned; Liz and the task force look for the toxin's designer to save Red's life.
